title: Hops patch

properties.name: description
properties.value: Hops patches are used to grow different Hops with the Farming skill; useful in brewing different types of ales with the Cooking skill. 4 hop seeds (only 3 Jute seeds) are required. Players can pay a nearby farmer to eliminate disease risk; or use varying types of compost and the option to water the patch to reduce (but not eliminate) chance of disease.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Hops patch
"Hops" redirects here. For the drunk involved in the Biohazard quest, see Hops (Biohazard). However, for the holiday emote, see Rabbit Hop.

Hops patches are used to grow different Hops with the Farming skill; useful in brewing different types of ales with the Cooking skill. 4 hop seeds (only 3 Jute seeds) are required. Players can pay a nearby farmer to eliminate disease risk; or use varying types of compost and the option to water the patch to reduce (but not eliminate) chance of disease.

Harvesting can yield between 3 and 35 (65 with Ultracompost) hops. After a hops patch has been harvested, the patch has to be re-planted. Hops on average give less experience in planting and harvesting than allotments; however, they are not nearly as susceptible to disease as allotments. Hops patch do not have a compost bin nearby but do have a Tool leprechaun.

  • 1 Hops seeds
  • 2 Hops patches
  • 3 Changes
  • 4 See also

Nasturtiums×1 		8×10 mins 23 26 283 Slayer's respite ingredient
  1. ^ N×10 mins means the crop will grow a little and can be watered again for each 10 minutes. This happens N times until it is fully grown.
  2. ^ Assume 10 hops are harvested
  3. ^ 3.0 3.1 All sacks required must be filled with 10 harvests.
  4. ^ Each basket must be filled with 5 harvests.

Hops patches[edit | edit source]

Location Closest teleport Image
North of Lumbridge farm
Gardener: Vasquen
  • Canoe
  • Chronicle teleport
  • Combat bracelet to Champions' Guild
  • Lumbridge Teleport
North of McGrubor's Wood
Gardener: Rhonen
  • Camelot Teleport to Seers' Village (after Kandarin Hard Diary)
  • Music cape teleport
  • Combat bracelet to Ranging Guild
  • Fairy ring code als to McGrubor's Wood
Yanille
Gardener: Selena
  • Watchtower Teleport to Yanille (after hard Ardougne Diary)
  • Yanille house portal: Teleport to House spell or redirected house tab
  • Minigame teleport to Nightmare Zone
  • Fairy ring code ciq
Entrana
Gardener: Francis
  • Balloon transport system
  • Minigame teleport to Rat Pits (Port Sarim)
  • Explorer's ring 2 or higher, then run south to Port Sarim
  • Amulet of glory to Draynor Village, then run to Port Sarim
  • Spirit Tree (if grown, requires 83 Farming) to Port Sarim


Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
28 April 2016
(update | poll)

It is now possible to add compost or supercompost to any farming patch during any growth stage of a crop.
